projects.title: Tectonicus: On the Edge of War
projects.description: Tectonicus: On the Edge of War is a Card-Based Auto Battler Game with a major focus on historical accuracy and meaningful gaming.
projects.fullDescription: Tectonicus: On the Edge of War is a game currently in development by Gamucatex. Tectonicus is a Card-Based Auto Battler Game. The game has a major focus on history, achieving historical accuracy and narration to the point where the player will after each session have a better understanding of history, i.e. Meaningful Gaming. During my time working with the game (2Â½ years), I was placed as Lead Developer, at the very beginning of the project.

projects.title: Verdant City
projects.description: A survival game where you play as a robot saving a polluted city through sustainable solutions.
projects.fullDescription: This game was my bachelor's project, I was the main programmer for this project. You are playing as a robot, with a constantly draining battery. You have to keep yourself alive, and save a heavily polluted uninhabitable city by building certain sustainable solutions.

projects.title: Interface for Spatial Audio Mixing in Virtual Reality
projects.description: VR interface for spatial audio mixing that integrates Unity with Max for Live and Ableton Live.
projects.fullDescription: This is a VR interface for spatial audio mixing. It was developed in a group of five, I was mostly working as the Unity developer. This interface, integrates Unity with Max for Live, which we can then use to communicate to the Digital Audio Workstation (DAW): Ableton Live.

projects.title: Imitation of Natural Settings in Virtual Reality for Relaxation
projects.description: VR experience designed to relieve stress by immersing users in relaxing natural environments.
projects.fullDescription: This was developed in a group of five people, where I was mainly the programmer and level designer. The purpose of the project was to develop a VR experience, that would relieve a person's stress, by putting them into one of two relaxing environments.

projects.title: Puzzle Solving Machine Learning Agent
projects.description: AI agents trained to solve puzzles using Unity ML Agents and TensorFlow.
projects.fullDescription: This was a solo project of mine. Here I taught Artificial Intelligence (AI) agents to solve a puzzle. The task of the agent is to reach the goal, but the goal is only reachable once a pressure plate is being pressed at the same time.
